alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 15 at 7:18PM EST until December 18 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Up to 2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas in North Topsail Beach, along the lower New River, White Oak River, Bogue and Core Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Up to 2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Minor to locally moderate ocean overwash possible Sunday into Sunday night, with highest impacts likely for North Topsail beach and areas north of Cape Lookout. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/10 PM 2.9 -2.9 0.4 1 None 16/10 AM 4.0 -1.8 0.3 1 None 16/11 PM 3.3 -2.5 0.8 1 None 17/12 PM 5.2 -0.6 1.8 1 Minor 17/11 PM 4.8 -1.0 2.3 1 None 18/12 PM 3.0 -2.8 -0.3 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; West Carteret
